channel.title: [MasterScape 718 loading 753] // Pre-eoc server // Eco
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/09/1393683960-logo.png[/img] [SIZE=7][COLOR="#FF0000"][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Links[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE] [URL=http://"http://www.masterscape-serveur.com"]Website [/URL]|| [URL=http://"http://www.masterscape-serveur.com/forum"]Forums [/URL]|| [URL=http://"http://www.masterscape-serveur.com/pages/download/Client.jar"]Client [/URL]|| [URL=http://"http://www.masterscape-serveur.com/pages/vote"]WebClient [/URL]|| [URL=http://"http://www.masterscape-serveur.com/pages/vote"]Vote [/URL]|| [URL=http://"http://www.masterscape-serveur.com/pages/donate/donate.php"]Donate[/URL]
-100% Shops fixed price and etc. -Vote4Spins -100% SOF added (All working Rarities) -All Dominion Glove Specials Work (Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts With Shop) -Full GWD (Including Nex and Nex Drops the new Nex Boots and Gloves!) -KING BLACK DRAGON JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE (You will love this feature) -Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides. -New Saradomin Amulets (Whisper, Murmur and Hiss) and Godwars Items (Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl's Crossbow, Armadyl's Buckler -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!) -Revenants and Glacors with working Drops (Pvp Armours for Revs) (Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors) -Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.) -Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc. -All 735+ Monsters such as Nex, Godwars, All of that good stuff -Home is at Warriors Guild -Pvp System with Pvp shop -A completely CUSTOM Ganodermic shop - all working auras including supreme's - eco base - eco pricing - flaming skulls - specs for all items the should have - Lucky item specs and bonuses - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - donorzones - All new 742 armours with bonuses - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests (10 approx) Much more content ingame
[COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=7] Media[/SIZE][/COLOR] [SIZE=6][COLOR="#FF0000"][COLOR="#FFD700"]Video[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DxR_ImlqPTw]MasterScape 718/742 RSPS - YouTube[/url] [SIZE=7][COLOR="#FFD700"] Images[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Fully 65 waves [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393855991-65-waves.png[/img] Agility [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393855985-agility.png[/img] Dung reward [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393855948-dung-reward.png[/img] Dung shop [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856044-dung.png[/img] Fishing [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856003-fishing.png[/img] Home sweet home ! [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856059-home.png[/img] Livid farm (Thanks @ rune-evo v3) [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856104-livid-farm.png[/img] Runecrafting [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856112-runecrafting.png[/img] Summoning [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856101-summoning.png[/img] Woodcutting [IMG]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/10/1393856122-woodcutting.png[/img] 5 difficulty level [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yjn26YO.png[/img] [IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/9247/thmh.png[/img] 100% SoF [IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/1269/mbcv.png[/img] Loyality shops (250 points per 30 minutes playing) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lKJesPr.png[/img] Prestige Shop (6 Prestige levels) [IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/1258/4f3d.png[/img] [COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=5]MUCH MUCH MORE CONTENT INGAME[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[/CENTER]

-100% Shops fixed price and etc. -Vote4Spins -100% SOF added (All working Rarities) -All Dominion Glove Specials Work (Golitath, Spellcasters and Swifts With Shop) -Full GWD (Including Nex and Nex Drops the new Nex Boots and Gloves!) -KING BLACK DRAGON JUST LIKE RUNESCAPE (You will love this feature) -Perfect Theiving, with delay and sides. -New Saradomin Amulets (Whisper, Murmur and Hiss) and Godwars Items (Bandos helmet, Bandos Gloves, Bandos Boots, Armadyl's Crossbow, Armadyl's Buckler -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Extreme Donator and Helper (With all unique crowns!) -Revenants and Glacors with working Drops (Pvp Armours for Revs) (Glaivens, Steadfasts and Ragefire Boots for Glacors) -Custom loyalty program with loyalty shop (Every 30 minutes players get a notification in the chat box that they receive 250 Loyalty points.) -Custom Quest Tab, Skills tele, monster tele, etc. -All 735+ Monsters such as Nex, Godwars, All of that good stuff -Home is at Warriors Guild -Pvp System with Pvp shop -A completely CUSTOM Ganodermic shop - all working auras including supreme's - eco base - eco pricing - flaming skulls - specs for all items the should have - Lucky item specs and bonuses - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - donorzones - All new 742 armours with bonuses - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests (10 approx)

Much more content ingame
